text:
The rmic task does not support the 'extdirs' attribute (which translates to 
the -extdirs option on the rmic command line). 

The -extdirs option is needed so that the stub compilation would be against a 
given extension directory which is different than the JVM's one. This attribute 
is supported by the javac task and is used there for the same purpose.
creator: dror@attunity.co.il

text: Added in CVS and nightly build 2001-03-17
